name: Juice Mania Splash
description:
Challenge and compete with your friends inside the game! You are not going to put it down once you have started! Take yourself on a wild journey and experience the match3 adventure with Juice Mania Splash. Never ending game and never ending fun with daily bonus every day!

Feature:
- Power boosters.
- HD Graphics.
- Full of Animations.
- Smooth Gamelay.
- Fun and unwinding match 3 amusement.
- Soothing Music.
- Attractive Background
